thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: Ralph Wright

author: Ralph Wright
title: Ralph Wright
text: Love the format and concept of this website and the discounts their authorized dealers are able to provide are fantastic whether if you are a seasoned hard negotiator or even just a newbie looking for a competivie no haggle price. You cannot go wrong either way. I have tried out packaging the vehicles based on the cars physical sticker price and they have all came out accurate down to the penny. Truecar has a great thing going... keep it up!
